title: Getting real with Deepika Padukone
text:
It’s time to get real and we have with us Bollywood's superstar Deepika Padukone who is not afraid to speak her mind. With great power comes great responsibility! And Femina's 60th anniversary special is all about a woman's strength and determination, beauty and grace, and hard work and ambition. Our cover star Deepika Padukone embodies these qualities.



The Bollywood leading lady talks about the changes that need to take place in the next 60 years for women empowerment. Calm, composed, and compassionate, the global icon shares her mother's words of wisdom that she holds close to her heart and she also describes what her first 60 seconds are like after she reaches home. So, stay tuned!

Next Story : 9 ethnic styles you should try this festive season
description: We present Bollywood’s leading lady Deepika Padukone, as she talks about the changes that need to take place in the next 60 years for women empowerment.
